ModsRuns_ModsHeader_Schema.__comment__: ModsRuns::ModsHeader schema. Should only have one GPU with a specific amount of memory running the HBM2 protocol. If the memory changes, then something went bad during the repairs that modified the amount of memory available.

properties.__comment__: There is a bug where MemRepair runs are not associated with GPUs. It can return -1 for GPU ID
Must pass the run within a reasonable time

ModsRuns_GpuSummary_RepairAttempts_Schem.__comment__: ModsRuns::GpuSummary::RepairAttempts schema. This is a verbose breakdown of each repair entry attempted
